channel.title: Comments on: DSL or NoDSL at Euruko 2010
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: Trevor Turk
item.dc:creator: Trevor Turk
item.description: Awesome talk - thank you! I'll have to check out Inherited Resources. I was always too afraid of magic and over-the-top DSLs to try restful controller helper libraries :)
item.content:encoded: Awesome talk – thank you! I’ll have to check out Inherited Resources. I was always too afraid of magic and over-the-top DSLs to try restful controller helper libraries ðŸ™‚
